description: This restaurant specializes in classic Italian dishes, offering traditional pasta and grilled meats. The menu features a selection of pasta, risotto, and steak.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, these main courses showcase the heart of Italian cuisine.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A photo of a classic lasagna, with layers of pasta, meat sauce, cheese, and bechamel, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A beautifully plated Tagliata Di Manzo, with sliced grilled steak, arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, presented at Italian Restaurant.
